short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get all the colors used on a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website Colors Finder is a handy web extension that allows you to easily identify all the colors used on a website. With just one click, Website Colors Finder scans the webpage and displays all the colors in a grid view. You can hover over each color to see its RGB value, or click on it to copy the color code to your clipboard. The extension is perfect for web designers, developers, or anyone who wants to learn more about the color schemes used on their favorite websites. With its simple and intuitive interface, Website Colors Finder makes it easy to explore the world of website colors.
